name: You are solely responsible for content you upload
reason: This point was judged to be irrelevant because it only amounts to saying "Don't do anything illegal".

tosdr.tldr: Grammarly has no obligation to monitor User Content and has no liability to you or any other person with respect thereto. You warrant, represent, and covenant that you have a valid and enforceable license to use all User Content.
